authors: Jason Chester For Daily Mail Australia
description: The former Home And Away actress was joined by husband Stuart Webb and their 17-month old daughter Mae for an appearance on picturesque Moreton Bay in Queensland.
title: Kate Ritchie enjoys a day out with husband Stuart Webb and daughter Mae
title_page: Kate Ritchie enjoys a day out with husband Stuart Webb and daughter Mae | Daily Mail Online
text:
She spent a memorable Christmas trawling Pacific waters aboard a luxury cruise ship, but Kate Ritchie was soon back on dry land for a spot of sightseeing with her loved ones.
The former Home And Away actress was joined by husband Stuart Webb and their 17-month old daughter Mae for an appearance on picturesque Moreton Bay in Queensland.
Kate, 37, looked casual in a simple white T-shirt and black skirt as she made her way around the coastal area, her eyes shielded behind a pair of sunglasses.
Stroll on: She spent a memorable Christmas trawling Pacific waters aboard a luxury cruise ship, but Kate Ritchie was soon back on dry land for a spot of sightseeing with her loved ones
With her dark hair swept away from her face the Australian star revealed a make-up free complexion while strolling with her family.
White tennis shoes completed the low key look, while a large striped handbag was casually slung across one shoulder.
With temperatures soaring, Kate held onto a bright pink water bottle for her infant daughter, who remained shaded beneath the hood of her pushchair.
In good company: The former Home And Away actress was joined by husband Stuart Webb and their 17-month old daughter Mae for an appearance on picturesque Moreton Bay in Queensland
The family were stepping out following an all-expenses paid trip aboard luxury liner The Pacific Eden.
Kate and her husband Stuart Webb set sail on board the vessel in late December, bringing their cherubic daughter Mae along for the adventure.
Despite being a party of three, the loved-up couple have managed to steal a few romantic moments away together, with Kate sharing a sweet selfie of the two, captioned: 'take me back'.
There they go: The trio enjoyed a post Christmas day out on the Queensland coast
Last year Kate revealed that her daughter was growing up before her eyes and confirmed that her first teeth had arrived.
'Look what else we did this week! #littletrooper #firsttooth,' she lovingly wrote alongside a snap of her mouth on Instagram.
Since the starlet gave birth, she has absolutely relished motherhood. 'I've never felt such - and I don't want to say love because I've read that before - but it's true,' she enthusiastically told WHO Magazine.
